titleStmt.title: Articles agreed on in the nationall synode of the Reformed Churches of France, held at Charenton neere Paris, in the moneth of September, 1623 Which the same ordaineth to be inuiolably kept in all the churches and vniversities of that realme.
Articles arrestez au Synode national. English
titleStmt.author: Eglises réformées de France. Synode national (1623 : Charenton-le-Pont)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, and Iames Short, printers to the famous vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
